name: Snorunt
description: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.effect: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.  If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.
